svg.title: Drag and drop of overlapping SVG links
svg.textArea: Try to drag gray boxe above. Drag feedback should be green, not red.
svg.script: var a = document.querySelectorAll('a'); a[0].addEventListener('dragstart', function (event) {event.dataTransfer.effectAllowed = 'copy'; event.dataTransfer.setDragImage(document.querySelectorAll('rect')[3], 50, 50);} ,false); a[1].addEventListener('dragstart', function (event) {event.dataTransfer.effectAllowed = 'copy'; event.dataTransfer.setDragImage(document.querySelectorAll('rect')[2], 50, 50);} ,false);
